visitors.title: Mobile app for visitors
visitors.desc: Search by category and GPS, save Favorites and move them to Visited, and read/write photo reviews. UI supports Arabic/English.

owners.title: Website for business owners
owners.desc: Create a rich profile (photos, description, links, map; restaurants add a menu link), pick a plan to boost visibility, and reply to reviews.

admin.title: Admin dashboard
admin.desc: Manage accounts, review reports, and curate touristic/religious places to keep the ecosystem healthy.

sync.title: Website × Mobile: one system
sync.item1: Updates on the website appear instantly in the app.
sync.item2: App reviews/photos show on the website; owners can reply.
sync.item3: Plans chosen on the website influence ranking and limits in the app.

visitors.title: For Visitors
visitors.item1: Discover nearby places by category & location
visitors.item2: Save Favorites → move to Visited after your trip

owners.title: For Business Owners
owners.item1: Professional profile with photos, description, links & map
owners.item2: Restaurant-friendly: add your public menu link
owners.item3: Flexible plans to boost visibility in the app

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.desc: Users can report spam, off-topic, or abusive content. Admin tools keep Ziara fair and helpful for everyone.

hero.title: Discover Lebanon, together.
hero.subtitle: Choose a plan and list your business — Restaurants, Hotels, Activities & Places, and Shops.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.item1: Menu link + photos of dishes (up to your plan limit).
restaurants.item2: Opening hours, delivery/pick-up info, and location map.
restaurants.item3: Customers can rate & write reviews; you can reply.

hotels.title: Hotels
hotels.item1: Show room types, amenities, and highlights.
hotels.item2: Add gallery and pin your exact location.
hotels.item3: Attach external booking link if you have one.

activities.title: Activities & Places
activities.item1: Tours, attractions, museums, landmarks describe what guests will find.
activities.item2: Add timing, ticket info (if any), and must-see photos.
activities.item3: Visitors can favorite, rate, and leave feedback.

shops.title: Shops
shops.item1: Showcase best items with short descriptions.
shops.item2: Add price range and contact details.

plans.title: Plans
plans.subtitle: Pick a plan that fits your needs. You can upgrade anytime.

cta.title: Ready to grow with Ziara?
cta.subtitle: Create an account or reach out to our team anytime.
